Raghuveer Venkatesh

Senior Data Engineer & Automation Specialist

Building scalable data pipelines and ETL solutions to transform complex data into actionable business intelligence.

View My Work Get In Touch

ABOUT ME

A results-driven Senior Software Engineer with a Master's in Applied Data Science and deep expertise in data automation, ETL pipeline development, and cloud services. I specialize in designing and implementing robust systems that handle large-scale data migration, processing, and visualization.

As a Certified ScrumMaster, I excel at leading engineering teams to deliver complex projects ahead of schedule, ensuring best practices in data validation, governance, and reporting. My passion lies in leveraging technology like Python, Azure, and PySpark to solve data-centric challenges and drive operational efficiency.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

July 2022 – August 2024

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Designed and implemented a scalable ETL pipeline for 38 Azure tenants using Python and Azure Data Factory.
  • Led a 6-engineer team as Scrum Master for a successful international SharePoint data migration project.
  • Developed a PowerApps solution with SQL to automate data entry across 146 office locations.
  • Automated the migration of 6TB of unstructured data to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online.
  • Built data ingestion pipelines for M365 logs, decreasing audit time by 70%.
June 2018 – June 2022

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Deployed scheduled jobs with Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 distributed servers.
  • Developed a travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days.
  • Created a web app to manage dynamic email distribution lists for over 60,000 users.
  • Provided real-time access to historical travel data via PowerBI for reporting and cost analysis.

FEATURED PROJECTS

A selection of my work in data engineering and analysis.

Data Pipeline & Analysis

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

View on GitHub

Machine Learning

FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor

Developed a regression model leveraging player performance and physical attributes to forecast football strikers' market value, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.

View Report

Data Automation

M365 Audit Automation

Built data ingestion and processing pipelines for Microsoft 365 activity logs, which decreased audit time by 70% by automating data validation, transformation, and loading processes for improved data governance.

Internal Project

Web Development

Internal Travel Portal

Developed Eurofins travel request portal which simplified filling, approval and tracking of travel request forms. The system reduced processing time from 10 days to 3 and provided real-time data access with PowerBI.
